'''A Housekeeper's Daily Chores ''' is the first act of [[Thoma]]'s [[Hangout Event]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have completed [[Chapter II]]: Act III - [[Omnipresence Over Mortals]], and reached [[Adventure Rank]] 30.

==Description==
At Thoma's invitation, you come to the [[Yashiro Commission]], only to hear two samurai talking about him behind his back...
